Effervescent tablet
Cautionary and advisory labels

Label 13 - Dissolve or mix with water before taking

Label 21 - Take with or just after food, or a meal

Potassium (potassium 6.5mmol) effervescent tablets BPC 1968 <ph outputclass="manufacturer">(A A H Pharmaceuticals Ltd)</ph> 3795911000001103

Potassium acid tartrate 300 mg

Potassium bicarbonate 500 mg

  • 56 tablet GSL

    NHS indicative price = £99.15

    Drug Tariff (Part VIIIA Category A) price = £92.02

Potassium (potassium 6.5mmol) effervescent tablets BPC 1968 <ph outputclass="manufacturer">(Actavis UK Ltd)</ph> 3796311000001109

Potassium acid tartrate 300 mg

Potassium bicarbonate 500 mg

  • 56 tablet GSL

    Drug Tariff (Part VIIIA Category A) price = £92.02

Potassium (potassium 6.5mmol) effervescent tablets BPC 1968 <ph outputclass="manufacturer">(Alliance Healthcare (Distribution) Ltd)</ph> 3796911000001105

Potassium acid tartrate 300 mg

Potassium bicarbonate 500 mg

  • 56 tablet GSL

    NHS indicative price = £92.02

    Drug Tariff (Part VIIIA Category A) price = £92.02

POTASSIUM BICARBONATE WITH POTASSIUM ACID TARTRATE
